author: oheger
msg: Extended NodeModel interface for querying an in-memory representation.
A method was added for converting the data of the model into a structure of
ImmutableNode objects. This is necessary when multiple configuration sources
with different model implementations are to be combined.

author: oheger
msg: Reworked UnionCombiner to operate on ImmutableNode objects.
The class and its test class were adapted to be compatible with the changes

author: oheger
msg: It was broken by the latest merge operation.

author: oheger
msg: Reworked MergeCombiner to operate on ImmutableNode objects.
The class and its test class were adapted to be compatible with the changes
